Name: Voice Control using Bluetooth
details: A circuit that responds to voice commands which are relayed over through a bluetooth connection was built. A voice input was given tot he phone which converts speech to text in an app. The string of text is then transmitted over a Bluetooth connection to a Bot that responds to specific commands.

Name: Smart Home Automation
details: The project aims to monitor the home appliances and measure power dissipation bty each individual appliance , making energy conservation easier. It provides an app to allow users/ consumers to fully take control of their energy usage and even allows scheduled control of appliances.

Name: Smart IOT Village
details: The primary Objective of this project is to design microcontroller based solutions for villages which can help their residents through data analysis and automation.The project includes a proof of concept of products which can have a meaningful impact on the lives of villagers , such as Solar Tracker, Cattle monitor and Interactive Schooling.

Name: Head Mouse
details: Head mouse basically fills the role of a conventional mouse for immersive user experience and for the differenttly-abled. The circuit senses the orientation of head and this is fed to a microcontroller which manipulates the values to move the cursor on screen and for click functions.

Name: Advanced Line Follower
details: The main aim of this project is to project is to generate an advanced line follower that uses the PID algorithm to smoothen the errors and to create a natural turn.
